bf03e523-728b-4b19-98d8-e4935ac45175.title: No Response Category
bf03e523-728b-4b19-98d8-e4935ac45175.body:
The No Response category is used when the flow continues without the user answering the question. It is usually used to avoid the user being stuck in a question.

In addition, we add the user to the "Conversation Ended" group so that before sending another message or entering another flow, we can check if the user is in that group and avoid sending messages

bbec3f01-d705-47cb-bd31-d2f2a542e9e5.title: Send Message
bbec3f01-d705-47cb-bd31-d2f2a542e9e5.body: Here we ask the user for their email. You can customize this message to your liking

f1863e3c-063d-487f-aac8-5154989c438e.title: Wait for Response
f1863e3c-063d-487f-aac8-5154989c438e.body:
Here we wait for the user's response and use the "has an email" rule.

We also use the "Yes" and "No" rules to check if the user wants to or not inform the email.

9cb3a7e2-bb60-4fad-9177-a9f3694c7eab.title: Add URN
9cb3a7e2-bb60-4fad-9177-a9f3694c7eab.body:
We add the user's email to the email URN. This URN is the channel in which the user can be contacted.

OBS: You actively send emails if the user has the email URN

efed2930-4558-4f7f-b889-a275c4521fcf.title: Update Contact
efed2930-4558-4f7f-b889-a275c4521fcf.body: We also save the email in the contact field. This data can be seen in the details of each contact and can be used in any message flow since the information is being saved in the contact and not in a specific message flow.

0743246a-ba2f-4119-b47b-8d9e0957dad9.title: Send Message
0743246a-ba2f-4119-b47b-8d9e0957dad9.body: Here we send a message for the case where the user types "No"

4ebafb7f-b897-4dd5-b04b-6d468dd33c3c.title: Send Message
4ebafb7f-b897-4dd5-b04b-6d468dd33c3c.body:
Here we check that the user did not enter an email and ask if they can inform it and give the option of "Yes" or "No".

It is important to remember that in this step, if the user has already responded with their email, we will be able to detect it, since all the rules are in the same card "Wait for Response".

actions.text: Due to lack of response, I ended this conversation. But if you want, just talk to me 😉
Understood, but in this case we need this information to contact you.
This is very important information for us! Can you tell us?

36a9ef19-2a21-48a5-98e7-f4c526888920.title: No Response Category
36a9ef19-2a21-48a5-98e7-f4c526888920.body:
The No Response category is used when the flow continues without the user answering the question. It is usually used to avoid the user being stuck in a question.

In addition, we add the user to the "Conversation Ended" group so that before sending another message or entering another flow, we can check if the user is in that group and avoid sending messages.

f9ab91ea-e511-4355-bf74-c320987ea552.title: Update Contact
f9ab91ea-e511-4355-bf74-c320987ea552.body: Here we save the phone number entered in the Contact field so that the data is saved in the contact and not just in the message flow.

ef7dd972-20d6-4573-bf88-a41be521c93e.title: Save Flow Result
ef7dd972-20d6-4573-bf88-a41be521c93e.body: Here we save a result called error counter. It will always be saved as 0 at the beginning of the message flow and we will use it later to verify if the user entered a number format different from the expected one

cd43ba58-75a2-427b-bf9d-57a3895f4523.title: Send Message
cd43ba58-75a2-427b-bf9d-57a3895f4523.body: Here we ask the user what their phone number is, showing the format accepted by REGEX

0e691d1d-de70-42bd-bf9d-1837dc794279.title: Wait for Response
0e691d1d-de70-42bd-bf9d-1837dc794279.body:
We wait for the user's response.

Remember that you can click on the option "Continue when there is no response..." and choose the time you want to wait.

Inside the "Wait for Response" card we use REGEX to create a rule to know if the user entered the number in the correct format. If necessary, you can add other regex rules.

ab6c3a9f-4489-47d7-a1ff-e617745ba1fd.title: Split by Flow Result
ab6c3a9f-4489-47d7-a1ff-e617745ba1fd.body: Here we check the error counter. If it's still 0, we categorize as "First Error" and treat accordingly, if it's the second error, the user passes through the Other category.

979e8ed1-08f8-4c56-9a20-3d90e73617a3.title: Split by Expression
979e8ed1-08f8-4c56-9a20-3d90e73617a3.body: If it's the first error of the user but their message has a number, we inform that we need a certain format. However, if it doesn't have a number, we send a different message

6e43344d-44aa-4811-aa15-b0f506ae5d78.title: Save Flow Result
6e43344d-44aa-4811-aa15-b0f506ae5d78.body:
Here we save +1 in the error counter. This will serve to verify if it's the first time the user has entered the number format incorrectly.

If the user makes another mistake, we send an email to the responsible sector and let them proceed.

f3baf8e5-cfbf-4284-b724-aaf2ed6a7c6e.title: Send Email
f3baf8e5-cfbf-4284-b724-aaf2ed6a7c6e.body:
If the user makes another mistake, we send an email to the responsible sector and let them proceed, as it may be a number from another country, etc.

You can edit the email to receive a signal when any user passes through this scenario.

After sending the email, we save the phone and let the user proceed to the next flow.

actions.text: Great. Now could you also tell me your phone number with the DDD? (DD) 9xxxx-xxxx
Due to lack of response, I ended this conversation. But if you want, just talk to me 😉

actions.subject: User with a different number from the format - Chatbot
actions.body:
Client with a different number from the format - Chatbot

Number informed in the Chatbot: @results.phone.value

Name: @contact.name

UUID: @contact.uuid

actions.text: Then @(title(contact.first_name)), I need a valid number! Please, type your number below. (DD) 9xxxx-xxxx
I need this information in case I need to contact you 😔

958fbc59-64b9-4e4a-80e9-3821cfb4796d.title: Divide by group
958fbc59-64b9-4e4a-80e9-3821cfb4796d.body:
Here we check if the user is in the "Provided Name" group, because if they are, it's because they have already provided their name previously, as the user is only added to this group after providing their name.

If you don't want to ask for the name again, just remove the link from the "Provided Name" category or lower the card until the message flow starts at the first "Send Message" card

bc46ae0d-ba55-48a8-9fc2-5bb5cba5d939.title: Other
bc46ae0d-ba55-48a8-9fc2-5bb5cba5d939.body: Here we handle the excess for when the user does not type anything, possibly having sent a photo of their document, etc.

8a7b28da-2802-46ff-87fa-89e340f99782.title: Send Message
8a7b28da-2802-46ff-87fa-89e340f99782.body:
The "Send Message" card serves to send messages to the user through a channel.

This message can be customized, for example, asking what the social name of that person is.

a920df8c-e0af-455a-a6c8-dd522415b6e7.title: No Response Category
a920df8c-e0af-455a-a6c8-dd522415b6e7.body:
The "No Response" category serves for when the flow continues without the user answering the question. It is usually used to not leave the user stuck in a question.

In addition, we add the user to the "Conversation Ended" group because before sending another message or entering another message flow we can check if the user is in that group and avoid sending messages.

f0115ba1-2bd4-467e-b93b-050308749b2e.title: End Category
f0115ba1-2bd4-467e-b93b-050308749b2e.body:
The "End" category serves for when the message flow continues without the user answering the question. It is usually used to not leave the user stuck in a question.

In addition, we add the user to the "Conversation Ended" group because before sending another message or entering another message flow we can check if the user is in that group and avoid sending messages.

65e53682-bb4c-4e56-a112-ff9b76cd8b2b.title: Wait for response
65e53682-bb4c-4e56-a112-ff9b76cd8b2b.body:
This card serves to stop the message flow and wait for a moment for the user to respond.

It is very important to be used to make the conversation more human.

Remember that you can click on the option "Continue when there is no response..." and choose the time you want to wait.

Within the "Wait for response" card we can also create rules for when, when the user responds, already check if there is any word or if it is a text.

1795c335-d680-4f5d-966d-df21759d91c2.title: Update contact
1795c335-d680-4f5d-966d-df21759d91c2.body: We save the user's name in the contact name field. It can be viewed in the "Estadio" module

actions.text: Would you like to know me better 😊
I need you to send me in text format...
Please, what is your full name?
Alright, when you want é just talk to me 😉
Due to lack of response, I ended this conversation. But when you want é just talk to me 😉

0bca9001-b1c7-4612-b7b3-ee993fc6d691.title: Enter a flow
0bca9001-b1c7-4612-b7b3-ee993fc6d691.body:
In this messaging flow we use the card "Enter a flow" to organize the structure of our questions. 

The card "Enter a flow" simply directs the user to another messaging flow in milliseconds and already executes the action of that other messaging flow. 

Therefore, for organizational purposes, we ask for name, phone and email, each in their respective messaging flow.

7cf60043-ccfa-4adc-bc54-64a86c4211e6.title: Name
7cf60043-ccfa-4adc-bc54-64a86c4211e6.body: In the messaging flow "Name" we will capture the user's name using the artificial intelligence created by Weni

1e9daa2e-d566-4d0b-959c-c0dccc5a0d02.title: Divide by Group Subflow
1e9daa2e-d566-4d0b-959c-c0dccc5a0d02.body:
This card is used to check if the user is in the group Conversation Ended, if so, the flow does not continue. Now if the user is not in that group, it will pass through the Other category and continue in the flow.

It is important to remember that the user is only placed in the Conversation Ended group if he wants to end or stay inactive.

5fabcaee-fb04-43c9-bef9-0d0e42cff0a9.title: Divide by Group Subflow
5fabcaee-fb04-43c9-bef9-0d0e42cff0a9.body:
This card is used to check if the user is in the group Conversation Ended, if so, the messaging flow does not continue. Now if the user is not in that group, it will pass through the Other category and continue in the messaging flow.

It is important to remember that the user is only placed in the Conversation Ended group if he wants to end or stay inactive.

caadc110-1e96-4110-ac23-1826838ecb3a.title: Phone
caadc110-1e96-4110-ac23-1826838ecb3a.body:
In the messaging flow "Phone" we will capture the user's phone number using rules REGEX in the card "Wait for Response".

Regex is a regular expression, or Regex, are patterns used to identify certain combinations or chains of characters in a string.

94ffa25a-d3a8-4151-9ffa-91cce5383b7f.title: E-mail
94ffa25a-d3a8-4151-9ffa-91cce5383b7f.body:
In the messaging flow "E-mail" we will capture the user's email using the "Has an email" rule in the card "Wait for Response".

This is a standard rule from the Weni platform, which checks if the text format is compatible with an email. It is important to note that there is no verification of the email's existence, but rather verification of the format sent by the user.

38fb0fd6-f24f-43d7-8da7-806e42046af8.title: Add to Group
38fb0fd6-f24f-43d7-8da7-806e42046af8.body:
This card is used to add the user who completed the sending of information to a group called "Complete Lead".

You can view all the people who are in that group by accessing the "Stadium" module > "Contacts" > "Filter by Group Lead Complete" in the lower left corner of the screen.

You can also actively send messages to all the people who are inside that group.

cd035481-2169-4a07-b136-845a72efca08.title: Send Message
cd035481-2169-4a07-b136-845a72efca08.body:
Here we put a welcome message if your chatbot is only capturing these data from the user.

If you prefer, you can remove this message and use the rest of the messaging flow in a step of your chatbot that has already been built. By removing this initial message, your messaging flow will already start at the user's name question.

fa0c18a6-a1e9-4851-9a4c-cd1543ce5c6c.title: Send Message
fa0c18a6-a1e9-4851-9a4c-cd1543ce5c6c.body:
Feedback message to the user.

It can be removed or changed, if you prefer.

5d5755d7-62e9-497b-9e00-1f197606b78a.title: Initial Information
5d5755d7-62e9-497b-9e00-1f197606b78a.body:
This is the main messaging flow for data capture. Therefore, it should be started when you need to collect the name, phone and email of some user.

In this flow we use the card "Enter a flow" to organize the steps and types of questions like name, phone and email. But the flow you should use is "Data Collection".

c559c7fe-02f6-477d-a685-d326a3478c3f.title: Divide by Intent
c559c7fe-02f6-477d-a685-d326a3478c3f.body:
Here we send the last message from the user to the classifier. All intelligence is used through this card and can categorize according to an intelligence intention.

In this case, if the intention is "greeting" we will greet the user accordingly.

19bbe3d2-b45b-4e8c-b774-2b5676ababa6.title: Attention
19bbe3d2-b45b-4e8c-b774-2b5676ababa6.body: If you want your flow to start actively, as there will be no message from the user to send to the intelligence, remove the card "Divide by Intent"

actions.text: Hello, it's a pleasure to talk to you
Welcome to our customer service center! We will start capturing data for registration
I managed to save your data here in our base 🤝
